name: Arcane Sphere Of Faces
description: Safeguard of the Witchbane Ruins' basement cellar. Mysteriously rare and highly unconventional.

name: Giant Bat
description: The Giant Bats of Limgrave are nocturnal creatures and often rest during the day, unless they are disturbed.
location: Near the cliffs on Western Limgrave.

name: Lesser Runebear
description: Feral, often massive bears with runic patterns on their chest. Most commonly found scavenging the realms of The Lands Between or fighting other wild creatures.

name: Abnormal Stone Cluster
description: Bizarre catterpillar-shaped beings formed of moss-covered spherical stones and a disturbing eye that looks like that of a human being. They are commonly found as dull groups of seemingly lifeless rocks.

name: Bladed Talon Eagle
description: The servants of Stormveil come in many shapes, including Eagles that have been enslaved and fitted with blades. Driving them to attack those who approach

name: Boar
description: The Boars of Limgrave are less aggressive than normal, but should not be assumed to be passive
location: in Forests of Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Burning Slug
description: Burning Slugs move slowly and are located in the open field.

name: Crab
description: Crabs thrive in the shallow ponds of Agheel Lake and the shores of Limgrave
location: Roaming the beaches of Western Limgrave.

name: Construct
description: An Enemy made by Enemies

name: Deer
description: Deer roam freely in the plains on Limgrave, now that hunters have all but disappeared
location: West Limgrave, South West Liurnia of The Lakes

name: Dog
description: Roaming through the fields of Limgrave, wild Dogs should not be assumed to be docile nor dull.

name: Giant Dragonfly
description: The Great Dragonflies of Limgrave buzz and harass all creatures in their vicinity

name: Direwolf
description: Found alone or in small packs, these bloodthirsty beasts stalk the Lands Between with predatory fervor.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Eagle
description: Majestic Eagles can be spotted among the cliffs, even during these times.

name: Giant Crab
description: Giant Crabs crowd the shores and shallows, attacking any who approach by swinging their powerful claws and spewing forth high-pressure water.
location: in the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Giant Land Octopus
description: Giant Land Octopuses are a dangerous foe for any daring to visit the beaches of Limgrave.

name: Giant Lobster
description: The Lands Between are rife with all manner of life forms, naturally evolving over long periods and adapting to the environment. One such creature is the Giant Lobster — a creature that evolved to grow to such enormous sizes in order to better defend itself against much deadlier threats.

name: Giant Poison Flower
description: Giant Poison Flowers sprout in unlikely places, and summon down the elements on those who approach them
location: within Post Town Remains in Limgrave.

name: Guillemot
description: The Guillemot on the beaches of Limgrave are docile animals, but they are easily spooked
location: Roaming the beaches of Western Limgrave.

name: Lesser Runebear
description: Feral, often massive bears with runic patterns on their chest. Most commonly found scavenging the realms of The Lands Between or fighting other wild creatures.

name: Lesser Red Wolf Of Radagon
description: Hostile, over-sized wolves majestically covered in scarlet fur.

name: Lesser Spider Hand
description: Lesser Spider Hands are horrific creatures, surpassed only by their more powerful, gigantic counterparts.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes, Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Land Octopus
description: The peculiar Land Octopus is a rather small but dangerous creature
location: In the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Owl
description: Owls can be resting on the cliffs of Stormhill, and would even seem friendly and unconcerned by those passing by
location: perched on cliffs around Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Poison Flower
description: Poison Flowers grow near caves and cellars in Limgrave

name: Land Squirt
description: Land Squirts are repulsive shallow water creatures that emit a poison mist to kill and devour those nearby

name: Rat
description: Giant rats plague the mines and caves of Limgrave, spreading diseases where they go
location: Limgrave Tunnels, Ailing Village, Tombsward Cave

name: Rabbitgaroo
description: A species unique to The Lands Between, as adorable as scared.
location: Limgrave, South West Liurnia of the Lakes,

name: Rotten Stray
description: Undead dogs haunt the depths of Limgrave's mines, attacking all those who dwell into the tunnels

name: Sheep
description: The sheep from Limgrave have long forgotten captivity, romaing the landscape freely instead.
location: in the pastures of Limgrave and Stormhill

name: Skeletal Slime
description: Skeletal slime drudges the shores and shallows of Limgrave, looking for prey to consume
location: in the watery areas of Agheel Lake and the beaches of Western Limgrave

name: Spirit Jellyfish
description: Spirit Jellyfish are passive creatures seeking to protect, unless angered

name: Teardrop Scarab
description: There are both Crimson and Cerulean Teardrop Scarabs. Defeat them to replenish the flasks that match their type.

name: Spider Hand
description: Spider Hands skitter about their environs, often clinging to walls to put the drop on unsuspecting trespassers. They are also capable of burrowing deep beneath the earth, violently bursting out of the ground to grab and crush their prey.
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes, Mountaintops of the Giants
drops: Somber Smithing Stone (2), Somber Smithing Stone (7)

name: Wild Mouflon
description: Wild Mouflons become hostile when threatened and fight their aggressors by charging forward and striking them with their large horns.

name: Turtle
description: Turtles are passive creatures almost driven to extinction by those seeking its meat, said to have curative properties

name: Wolf
description: Wolves hunt the Lands Between in packs, and all those traveling should beware of their dangerous pack leaders

name: Prawn Miner
description: Hostile over-developed creatures resembling large shrimps. Remarkably agile.
location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Caelid Waypoint Ruins

name: Farum Azula Dragon
description: Farum Azula Dragons fly around the Farum Azula or what's left of it, if any of them notice someone roaming around, they will come to hunt the down. They have the power of thunder and they will use it aggresively towards enemies.

name: Bloody Finger Nerijus
description: Bloody Finger Nerijus follows the Bloody Finger code, hunting for fellow Tarnished without remorse
location: Invades on the ravine leading north-east from Agheel Lake, toward Murkwater Catacombs

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-eater
description: Invaded by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater!

name: Bloody Finger Okina
location: Flame Peak, Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Edgar The Revenger
description: Edgar the Revenger is a warrior clad in medium armor and wields a halberd. His moveset involves mostly physical attacks and his poise is easily broken with magic.
location: Revenger's Shack, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: Maleigh Marais's identity is completely shrouded by their mask and long robes. They are equipped with a rapier and move carefully around opponents. They are easily staggered with magic attacks such as Glintblade Phalanx.
location: Fields west of The Shaded Castle

name: Moongrum Carian Knight
description: Moongrum the Carian Knight is the guardian of Raya Lucaria Academy's Grand Library, he is the last line of defense against intruders who are wanting to slay the head sorcerer of the institute. Just like you, a Tarnished, Moongrum is capable of wielding two different weapons, a shield, can use sorcery, and even use Flasks to recover health. A true warrior of Raya Lucaria.

name: Recusant Henricus
description: Invaded by Recusant Henricus!

name: Albinauric
description: Due to their comically large and round heads, Albinaurics are perpetually hunched-over. They are often found in groups of five or more and they employ rudimentary combat tactics, often attacking recklessly with repeated swings and long combos that leave them open. At times, you may spot an Albinauric performing quick cartwheels on the battlefield, displaying agility despite their stature.

name: Albinauric Wolfback Archer
description: Guarding the rooftops of Ordina.

name: Banished Knight
description: A tall knight who was banished and bound to serve the Grafted Lord, and to kill those trespassers of Stormveil Castle. They are normally seen wielding a large weapon such as a longsword with a shield or a polearm, and they are fully protected with a complete set of armor.

name: Azula Beastman
description: The Beastmen of Farum Azula are ferocious half-man, half-beast warriors. They display remarkable agility and are proficient in a plethora of weaponry including various curved blades, greatswords, shields and spears. Many are also excellent marksmen with their unique curved throwing knives which they use with deadly precision.

name: Baleful Shadow
description: Assassins of the Two Fingers sent forth to carry out their dirty work

name: Blackflame Monk
description: Mysterious hooded figures belonging to an order of monks that call upon the power of the Black Flame, as well as their astute martial prowess to fell foes and trespassers of their domains.

name: Black Knight
description: The Black Knight, riding atop a dark steed, wielding a mighty halberd.
location: Limgrave, south-east of the telescope, patrolling on a bridge

name: Godrick Knight
description: Wielders of heavy swords and spears, protected by large shields and fully armored. These Knights are often aided in combat by soldiers or hostile dogs, therefore posing a threat to the unprepared and novice.

name: Castle Guard
description: Castle Guards comprise the bulk of Stormveil's defenses, but are by no means the most dangerous of the many great ones within.

name: Chanting Winged Dame
description: The Chanting Winged Dames of Liurnia of The Lakes are equally hostile as they are suspicious.
location: Ruin-Strewn Precipice, Liurnia of The Lakes, Fort Faroth

name: Commoner
description: The Commoner is a servant that is bound to perform duties for their superiors within Stormveil Castle. They appear to be tall, slender, yet weak, who is still capable of fighting trespassers.

name: Demi-human
description: Agile and hostile, Demi-Humans scavenge the land in groups commanded by a leader, a stronger and more menacing creature. They roam the field light-armored and wielding a wide range of melee weapons and wooden shields.
location: Caves and beaches of Limgrave, such as Dissenter's Cave.

name: Fire Monk
description: Fire Monks hierarchically gather in ceremonies, often at night, burning their way through Liurnia of The Lakes with torches and Mobile Flamethrowers. Fire Monk Abbots have the powerful ability of bursting flames from their hands and must be fought carefully.

name: Sorcerer Miner
description: Frail and malnourished, Diggers wield a glintstone-imbued staff for mining which doubles as a weapon when push comes to shove.

name: Flame Guardian
description: Flame Guardians are slender humanoids dressed in simple white garbs and wearing a bronze mask, concealing their identity. They are equipped with long, flaming poles/staves and wield fire magic.

name: Glintstone Sorcerer
description: Glintstone Sorcerers are decked in Raya Lucarian Robes and distinct Glintstone Crown masks that obscure their identity. These scholars have access to lower level spells such as Glintstone Pebble, among others.

name: Gnoll
description: Hungry Gnolls are usually found eating from dead bodies which makes them vulnerable to surprise or stealth attacks, but they are quick and unforgivingly lethal. They come in different classes, some of the wield a sword and use it very acrobatically, other use shields and some even are able to cast thunder.

name: Godrick Soldier
description: The Godrick Soldiers of the Lands Between now roam the landscape, their clothes rags, hoping to rebuild their lives
location: Gatefront Ruins, Castle Morne, Stormgate, Roaming the Limgrave landscape

name: Golem
description: Golems lay inactive in the hills of Stormhill, but those foolish enough to wake them will soon curse their fate
location: West ruins of Stormhill., Castle Morne Entrance, Ainsel River Well, Leyndell, Royal Capital

name: Highwayman
description: Former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry. Clandestine and secluded from civilazation, now they lie in hidden caves.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Invading another world. Defeat Great Horned Tragoth!

name: Gold Dragon Cult Knight
description: Exceedingly tough and skillful Knight, a golden armor-wearing menace lethal to most. Highly trained warrior and a threatening adversary due to its fine combat skills.

name: Imp
description: Imps infest many catacombs in the Lands Between, although some theorize they could be protecting their secrets

name: Imp Miner
description: Small and agile creatures that typically conceal themselves within a smokescreen., Often wielding an axe or a flail amd performing flying attacks.

name: Invisible Warrior
description: Sneak warriors, patient and quick to get in your back.

name: Imp
description: Imps infest many catacombs in the Lands Between, although some theorize they could be protecting their secrets

name: Lesser Burial Watchdog
description: A living construct fashioned after felines and hounds, made to watch over catacombs. These constructs wield massive stone weaponry and are attuned to different elements.

name: Knight Of Zamor
description: Knights of Zamor are slender humanoids with long hair, wielding a peculiar curved blade. These warriors are graceful and perform almost dance-like maneuvers as they weave across the battlefield. As denizens of the Mountaintops of the Giants, Knights of Zamor are strongly attuned to Frost, utilizing its powers to bolster their swordplay.

name: Lesser Pumpkin Head
description: The Lesser Pumpkin Head is a weaker variant of the Pumpkin Head. It appears to be an outcast due to its appearance and is mainly used as one of a weapon to fight against intruders and trespassers alike. The Lesser Pumpkin Head can be seen wearing a Pumpkin Helm, a distressed cloak, and wields a large club.
location: Castle Morne, Raya Lucaria Academy, Limgrave

name: Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit
description: A guardian that sleeps deep within the crypt of Stormveil Castle. It is quick and very aggressive when it attacks and moves similar to a centipede with its multiple legs. The Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit also features two large arms and a tail that it mainly uses to swing around or to slam the ground.

name: Living Jar
description: The Living Jar, a walking vase that has long arms used for reaching and attacking their foes. A Living Jar may appear small in a group and it can also appear as a singular giant entity, capable of using slow, yet strong attacks.

name: Lesser Wormface
description: Lesser Wormface may not be as large as Wormface itself but they can be found roaming around in groups around Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Maneuverable Flamethrower
description: Large wagons operated from the inside that shoot fire from a sculpture's mouth.

name: Marionette Gargoyle
description: The Marionette Gargoyle are statues within Raya Lucaria Academy that have been reanimated with magical properties. They mainly fly in the air and wield a scythe that they use to attack their foes. They are usually found on posts, pretending to be statues.

name: Marionette Soldier
description: Marionette Soldiers are puppets that are created and given life by superior being that reside within Raya Lucaria Academy. Their purpose is to protect and stop intruders from entering the institute. These soldiers appear to have multiple arms wielding more than one weapon, making them unpredictable in regards to how they will strike.
location: Raya Lucaria Academy, Academy Gate Town, Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, Witchbane Ruins

name: Miner
description: The ever working miners of Limgrave know no life but their toil, and will fiercely defend it
location: Limgrave Tunnels, Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Ruin-Strewn Precipice

name: Mounted Northern Mercenary
description: Mounted Northern Mercenaries are often seen guarding important deliveries and outposts, such as Stormgate

name: Mounted Knight
location: North-east region of Limgrave, North of Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Noble Sorcerer
description: Noble Sorcerers are frail old men wearing tattered garbs and a dirty yellow cape. They use a standard glintstone staff as both a sorcery catalyst and walking stick.

name: Misbegotten
description: The Misbegotten are small humanoid creatures with small wings on their backs and a tail that reaches to the ground. Treated as slaves or worse from the time they are born, they rush in attack wildly and ruthlessly with their Iron Cleavers.
location: Castle Morne, Weeping Peninsula, Mt. Gelmir

name: Kaiden Sellsword
description: Kaiden Sellswords roam the land, looking to be hired for several protection roles

name: Omen
description: A large ogre that is kept imprisoned within the grounds of Stormveil Castle. It appears to be battered and treated violently to discipline it, and used as a weapon to fight against trespassers.

name: Pendulum Statue
description: A golden statue that sits on a small wagon. Attached to it are two pendulum blades that can extend to capture its prey. The Pendulum Statue is being controlled by an unkown creature that rests within it, only by opening its chest will it reveal its root-like tentacles.

name: Old Knight Istvan
description: Invading another world. Defeat Old Knight Istvan!

name: Pumpkin Head
description: The breaking disrupted the flora and fauna of the region. Some took a rather intense liking to the larger plants that emerged

name: Raya Lucaria Sorcerer
description: Academicians of the Raya Lucaria Academy. These sholars dedicate their lives to learning and mastering the art of sorcery and serve one superiror sorcerer who resides within the institute. They are able to use glintstone sorcery to strike their foes from afar, and are still capable of using their weapon for close-quarters combat.

name: Rileigh The Idle
description: Invading another world. Defeat Rileigh the Idle!

name: Revenant
description: A grotesque amalgamation of limbs, the Revenant is a creature with the body structure of an arachnid and the face of a human. Much like a spider, it possesses many limbs that seem to have been grafted onto its body, taken from diseased humans. The Revenant is capable of traveling through portals it creates with a peculiar form of magic, swiftly emerging behind a foe to catch them off guard.

name: Servant Of Rot
description: Servants of Rot relish in the pungent miasma expelled by Poison Flowers. Their bodies are heavily mutated by the rot, their heads transformed into large crowns of fungi. These presumably former humans know only the rot and they worship it like a deity, bathed in its fog of decay.

name: Raya Lucarian Warden
description: Wardens roam the halls of the Raya Lucaria Academy, armed and watchful for furtive marauders.

name: Soldier
description: Soldiers defend the many outposts of the Lords from incoming threats, such as the Tarnished
location: Stormveil Castle, Stormhill, Main Limgrave, Weeping Peninsula

name: Skeleton Mage
description: Skeleton Mages are usually found on graveyards in Liurnia of the Lakes. They can out from the ground, they can be found in groups, wielding scythes and constantly casting a spell launching ghostly skulls against you.

name: Skeleton
description: Skeletons rise from cemeteries and ruins of the Lands Between, attacking relentlessly any who approach
location: In the beaches and dungeons of Limgrave, and in the cemetery area of Stormhill

name: Slender Wayfarer
description: A rare and long-haired creature, tall and slender, often found at the shore.

name: Swordstress
description: Nimble warriors protecting and patrolling the eternal cities.

name: Troll
description: The Trolls of the Lands Between are frequently enslaved for defensive positions, but are also used in lieu of beasts of burden
location: Along the road north of the Collapsed bridge

name: Troll Knight
description: Trolls are often employed to guard key locations, such as staircases large enough to accommodate their massive bodies. Often unmatched in strength, it bears the question... What manner of creature poses enough of a threat such that the mighty troll would find itself in need of heavy armor...?
location: Caria Manor, Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Undead Soldier
description: Undead creatures, decayed and struggling to maintain balance while roaming the fields of The Lands Between.

name: Twinsage Sorcerer
description: Twinsage Sorcerers are distinguished from other scholars by the crowns worn on their head, depicting the Twinsage Conspectus, with distinct blue crystals forming at the top of the twin heads.

name: Wraith Caller
description: As their name suggests, Wraith Callers are equipped with Wraith Calling Bells that they use to channel death magic, summoning vengeful spirits to attack those that dare intrude upon the ruins of Liurnia. Devout worshippers of the Revenants, Wraith Callers are able to utilize the Revenants' dimensional portals, albeit to a lesser extent.
